organization.name: University of Wisconsin–Madison Data Science Institute

messages.sign_up_with: If you are a UW affiliate, please sign up with your UW NetID.  Otherwise, sign up with a username of your choice.
messages.sign_in_with: If you created your map account with your UW NetID, please select that option.  Otherwise, sign in with the username that you chose when creating your map account.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.message: Welcome to the Open Source Map. We encourage you to set up your profile to make it easier for others to find you.  To edit your profile, just click the 'Edit My Profile' button at the top left. We hope you enjoy using the Open Source Map.
